data.title: The Story of Piera [Storia di Piera] (Original photograph of Isabelle Huppert and Hanna Schygulla from the 1983 film) by Isabelle Huppert, Hanna Schygulla (starring); Marco Ferreri (director, screenwr
data.meta_description: N.p., N.p. - 1983 - Vintage borderless reference photograph from the 1983 film, showing Isabelle Huppert and Hanna Schygulla in a nude embrace on the seashore. Based on the 1980 autobiography by Italian theater actress Piera Degli Esposti with Dacia Maraini, who both contributed to the screenplay. A young woman comes of age with her free-spirited, sexually promiscuous, and mentally unstable mother. Shot on location in Lazio, Italy. 7 x 8.25 inches. Near Fine. - The Story of Piera [Storia di Piera] (Original photograph of Isabelle Huppert and Hanna Schygulla from the 1983 film)
